Summary: 6 - 8 starlike lights appeared for approximately 2 minutes moved laterally then disappeared abruptly one by one.
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around July 13th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was Having a backyard party in a suburb of San Antonio near Helotes, TX.the backyard faces NNE direction. 15 people noticed 3 starlike lights appear much like fighter planes flying in an organized pattern. 10 seconds after the first 3 lights appeared 3-4 more lights appeared about 10 seconds apart. it looked as if they were flying toward us at a high rate of speed but then began abruptly disappearing one at a time and were completely gone after about 2 minutes.
